survey_brief: This survey aims to gather employee perceptions and feedback on corporate sustainability initiatives, including awareness, participation, and perceived impact.

questions.question_text: How familiar are you with your company's sustainability initiatives?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for familiarity assessment. Ensure options are mutually exclusive.

script.question_text: How familiar are you with your company's sustainability initiatives?

questions.question_text: Which of the following sustainability initiatives are you aware of in your company? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Include an option for 'None of the above' to capture lack of awareness.

script.question_text: Which of the following sustainability initiatives are you aware of in your company? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How would you rate your company's efforts in promoting sustainability?
questions.client_notes: Use a balanced 5-point scale for rating. Ensure neutral midpoint.

script.question_text: How would you rate your company's efforts in promoting sustainability?

questions.question_text: What suggestions do you have to improve your company's sustainability initiatives?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Limit response length to 500 characters.

script.question_text: What suggestions do you have to improve your company's sustainability initiatives?

questions.question_text: Have you personally participated in any of the company's sustainability initiatives?
questions.client_notes: Binary question to gauge participation. Follow up with Q6 if 'Yes' is selected.

script.question_text: Have you personally participated in any of the company's sustainability initiatives?

questions.question_text: Which sustainability initiatives have you participated in? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Include an 'Other' option with text field for specificity.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkboxes (multi-choice) with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which sustainability initiatives have you participated in? (Select all that apply)
